name: Xpraize Beta
description:
Xpraize Beta, a game developed by RedefineArts, is an innovative game that allows TRPGs to be played in a virtual space.
The game is available in PC and VR versions, and in the VR version of the software, you are the "player".
You, the player, play a character according to the scenario read out by the "Game Master," a participant from the PC version.
The voice recognition system allows for realistic magic chanting, weapon attacks, and all kinds of free actions.
By entering the world in VR, you will have an unprecedented TRPG experience.

The currently distributed scenarios are online multiplayer for up to 5 players, with all players except the game master participating from VR.
We are now including a fantasy scenario called "Dragon Descendants".
We hope you will experience the fun of Xpraize through this scenario first.

Additional scenario updates will be regularly scheduled after the release and will be distributed as DLC.
